Dear Members

Can anybody please tell me what is meant by the term 'nihiki design'?  
It appears to refer to a tsuba design incorporating two rectangular 
openings, one on each side of the seppa-dai, but I have never been 
able to identify what, if anything, these represent.

Regards, John L.
